Pages.Text: Celcynd the Dour, mage of Rithwic. Ah, the poor soul.  A brilliant mage in his youth, and apprenticed to the famed Harlune of Arwic.  Celcynd was the first to master Empyrean planar magic.  It failed him at a critical point, however.  When Holtburg was under siege by Tumeroks, he cast a portal which allowed the children to escape.  It consumed so much mana, however, that he was unable to cast a second portal in time to rescue the adults.  He sank into his guilt, and even the love of Brentsella was not enough to bring him out of it for long.
